Tools:

These are a few tools that I like to use from time to time, some are my own, some have been created by others.

Software:

  • PID Control Library. A PID Control Library written in C++
  • USB Multi-channel relay control. Script for triggering Kmtronic relays.
  • Keithley 2XXX DMM Interface. Script for interfacing Keithley series 2xxx digital multimeters over RS232.
  • Regular Expression Message Validator. Great for deployment on embedded systems that require context passing and mode switching features.
  • Android Serial Communications Library. Accessig serial ports through Java is not straightforward, so this is a great addition to any Android based robotics project. This requires NDK to build.
  • sshuttle A handy proxy/VPN access to geo-fenced data tool. Especially useful when you need access to resources that are local only. ;)
  • Visual trackers benchmark. Good benchmarking reference for various visual trackers.

Reading:

  • Planning Algorithms - Steven M. LaValle
  • Robotics Modelling, Planning and Control - Siciliano, Sciavicco, Villani, Oriolo
